column4: Jordan-U: Thanks. apache2 is in the list but i still don't know how to stop/restart it
What's a nice FTP/SSH client for Ubuntu?
gFTP looks horrible
on ubuntu
i meant a GUI version so i can drag/drop folders into there
nautilus does ftp/ssh (file -> connect to server)
wow nautilis is great! thanks
it will only run when you login with that user
Is there a way to get numlock turned on by default?
google for "numlock ubuntu", first hit looks promising
are you using metacity as your window manager (not compiz)?
How do i tell?
did you install compiz?
No.
by "doesn't work" do you mean it doesn't let you change things or you change them and then you press the shortcut but it does nothing?
I  was trying to set lock screen to win+L. As soon as i hit the win key it sets to that key. It won't let me set win+L
Where it says /apps/metacity is that /usr/lib64/metacity? I just have a single file with a weird icon in there. I don't have a /apps directory
in "gconf-editor"
just type 'gconf-editor' in a terminal
the lock screen one doesn't appear anywhere in metacity folders. I set it to Super R so i could find it in the lost but none had naything like that
then make a new command (someone was looking for it the other day as well and we couldn't find it) that does 'gnome-screensaver-command --lock'
Any specific folder? Is this the equivalent of the Windows registry?
some dir under /apps/metacity lets you setup custom commands and then you can bind run_command_1 in keybindings.  Yes and no
